trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The guard quartermaster seems a bit overwhelmed.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the guard quartermaster.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_01<tab>Search for usable supplies at the Northern Staging Point.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_02<tab>Deliver the knobbly cane to the guard quartermaster.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the guard quartermaster.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_000<tab>I hate to be abrupt, but─can you help me?

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_001<tab>Thank y─ Oh goodness, it's you! The one who turned the tide at Holminster Switch! Well, I feel doubly bad about this now, but I have little choice. I need any help that I can get.

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_100_001<tab>Thanks to the eaters, everything not in ruins is in disarray, and I'm working to determine what materiel we have, but that requires sifting through it all! And if I don't know what we <var 1A 02 /var>need<var 1A 01 /var> it will be fruitless, as I won't be able to order, and─
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_002<tab>Ahem. In short, I need you to meet me at the Northern Staging Point. Please.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_010<tab>We'll be assessing the situation out here. Though it may save time if you were to first tell me what destruction you personally witnessed?

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_011<tab>Many structures burned or otherwise damaged in the fighting... Yes, I thought as much. I may look into procuring tents so that the laborers come to assist in the reconstruction need not journey back and forth each day─that ought to save time.

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_012<tab>I'd be curious to know whether anything out here actually has survived. Might I ask you to survey the northern area and tell me if you find any materiel or other supplies that might still be fit for use?
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_013<tab>Thank you. Please meet me here when you've finished.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>You pick up the cane, and see that it has been weathered by what must have been many years of use.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>You peer into the crate to find that it, fortuitously, contains several undamaged tents.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>You examine the rack, and notice that many of the weapons that remain are, as yet, undamaged.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_030<tab>Finished your inspection, have you? What did you find?
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_031<tab>Oh, shepherds around here use this sort of cane. It must belong to one of the residents. Or former residents, now, I suppose...
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_032<tab>We can return it to them, though I imagine they'd rather have their land and livestock back. What else was there?

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_033<tab>Good to hear that I shouldn't need to procure any fresh tents. The weapons are less immediately useful, though I will of course have them collected. It seems that I'll primarily need to order tools, as there were none to be found in the areas I checked, either.

TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_034<tab>I very much appreciate your help─this has gone much more swiftly for your presence. Would you accept a small reward? I have a bit of coin stored for just such an occasion back at the fort.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_040<tab>And now the real work begins. Fighting off the sin eaters was no small feat, but the task of rebuilding seems almost more daunting.
TEXT_LUCKZB003_03381_SUPPLYOFFICER03881_000_041<tab>Nothing for it but to grit our teeth and get to it, however. For the sake of everyone in Lakeland.
